## The peak of refugees: Dispersion of terms across time

# Loading packages

```{r}
library(polmineR)
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
use("plprbt")
```


# What to get: Queries

```{r}
cqp_query <- c(
  "Flüchtling" = '"Flüchtling(|e|en)"',
  "Asyl" = '"Asyl.*"',
  "Ein-/Zuwanderer" = '"(Ein|Zu)wanderer.*"',
  "Ausländer" = '"Ausländer(|n)"',
  "MMH" = '"mit" "(Migrationshintergrund|Zuwanderungsgeschichte)"'
  )
```


# Retrieving hits

```{r}
my.hits <- hits(
  "PLPRBT", query = cqp_query, cqp = TRUE, sAttribute = "speaker_date",
  progress = FALSE
)
```


# Preparing the data for plotting

```{r}
df <- as.data.frame(my.hits@dt)
df$speaker_date <- as.Date(df$speaker_date)
df <- subset(df, !is.na(speaker_date))
```


# Do it.

```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(x = speaker_date, y = count, colour = query)) + geom_smooth()
```
